item.text: Six days later Jesus took with him Peter, James, and John the brother of James, and led them privately up a high mountain.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he was <st data-num="3339" class="">transfigured</st> <st data-num="1715" class="">before</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">His</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4383" class="">face</st> <st data-num="2989" class="">shone</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="2246" class="">sun</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothes</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st><n id="2" /> also <st data-num="3708" class="">appeared</st> before <st data-num="846">them</st>, <st data-num="4814" class="">talking</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>. <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st>, I will <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="4633" class="">shelters</st><n id="4" />—<st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> for <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> for <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st>.”

While <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st>, a<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5460" class="">bright</st> <st data-num="3507" class="">cloud</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1982" class="">overshadowed</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3507" class="">cloud</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>,<n id="4" /> “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> one <st data-num="27" class="">dear</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> I <st data-num="2106">take great delight</st>. <st data-num="191" class="">Listen</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!”<n id="6" />

When the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, they were <st data-num="4970" class="">overwhelmed</st> with <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">threw</st> themselves down <st data-num="1909" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4383" class="">faces</st> to the ground.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="681" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. “<st data-num="1453">Get up</st>,” he <st data-num="3004">said</st>. “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>.”
When they looked up, all they saw was Jesus alone.
As they were coming down from the mountain, Jesus commanded them, “Do not tell anyone about the vision until the Son of Man is raised from the dead.”

The <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> <st data-num="1122" class="">do</st> the <st data-num="1122" class="">experts in the law</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st>?”

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>, “<st data-num="2243">Elijah</st> does <st data-num="3303" class="">indeed</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> first <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="600" class="">restore</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st> has <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st> they <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">recognize</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">whatever</st> they <st data-num="2309" class="">wanted</st>. <st data-num="3779">In<n id="1" /> the same way</st>, the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> <st data-num="3195" class="">will</st> <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846">their</st> hands.”
Then the disciples understood that he was speaking to them about John the Baptist.
When they came to the crowd, a man came to him, knelt before him,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, have <st data-num="1653" class="">mercy</st> on <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he has <st data-num="4583" class="">seizures</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3958">suffers</st> <st data-num="2560" class="">terribly</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">he</st> <st data-num="4178" class="">often</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">falls</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>.

I <st data-num="4374" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="1" /> they were <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="2323" class="">heal</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="5599" class="">You</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="571" class="">unbelieving</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1294" class="">perverse</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st>! <st data-num="2193" class="">How much</st> <st data-num="4219">longer</st> must I <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>? <st data-num="2193">How much</st> <st data-num="4219">longer</st> must I <st data-num="430" class="">endure</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?<n id="5" /> <st data-num="5342" class="">Bring</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuked</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="846" class="">demon</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1140">it</st> <st data-num="1831">came out</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3816" class="">boy</st> was <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">moment</st>.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2398">privately</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="1223 5101">Why</st> <st data-num="3756 1410">couldn’t</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">cast</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1544">out</st>?”

He told them, “It was because of your little faith. I tell you the truth, if you have faith the size of a mustard seed, you will say to this mountain, ‘Move from here to there,’ and it will move; nothing will be impossible for you.”
When they gathered together in Galilee, Jesus told them, “The Son of Man is going to be betrayed into the hands of men.
They will kill him, and on the third day he will be raised.” And they became greatly distressed.
After they arrived in Capernaum, the collectors of the temple tax came to Peter and said, “Your teacher pays the double drachma tax, doesn’t he?”

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3483">Yes</st>.” When Peter <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">spoke</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4399">first</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="5101">What</st> do <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">think</st>, <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>? <st data-num="575" class="">From</st> <st data-num="5101">whom</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">do</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earthly</st> <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">collect</st> <st data-num="5056" class="">tolls</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2778" class="">taxes</st>—<st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="245" class="">foreigners</st>?”

After he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="575">From</st> <st data-num="245" class="">foreigners</st>,” <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="686">Then</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1658" class="">free</st>.

But so that we don’t offend them, go to the lake and throw out a hook. Take the first fish that comes up, and when you open its mouth, you will find a four-drachma coin. Take that and give it to them for me and you.”
